FWpst Original Message From Oquinn Kari Sent Friday December PM To Slone Jeanie Subject FW Original Message From Richter Brad Sent Friday December AM To Fitzpatrick Amy Cc Oquinn Kari Subject FW Amy Attached is an EOL bonus matrix per Louises request I havent changed any of the numbers from the basic calculation done by Kari For clarification Kara Lauer is a Sr Specialist Call me if you have questions Brad Richter Original Message From Oquinn Kari Sent Friday December AM To Richter Brad Subject FW Attached is the file waddl info According to our records Kara Lauer is a Sr Spec however the file you sent indicates she is a Spec Please read the detailed info at the bottom of the spreadsheet which indicates how the Recommended Bonuses were derived Kari Oquinn Original Message From Richter Brad Sent Friday December AM To Oquinn Kari Subject Here is the file Please call my cell phone if you have questions Thank you Brad Richter

EACommercial Managers and above Cc Please see attached spreadsheet Some additional info about the spreadsheet was pulled from the system as of and formated today should reflect all promotions but will not show the EWSEES groups or Enron South America is seperated by job groups and sorted by total agreement value employees who recieved agreements in our recent agreement efforts are highlighted in green employees who are currently under executed agreement and also have drafts outstanding will show agreement values associated with the draft agreement only not the current executed agreement employees who are currently under agreement with no draft outstanding will show agreement values still to be paid under the current contract not the full value of the old contract the password is the same Please let me know if you would like formattingcontent changes or have additional questions

FW Redmond Responsibilitiespst As Brian is away on vacation I thought you may be able to assist me Brian Redmond does not have responsibilities in his profile for the MD prc I took Laura Luces profile and changed the region to Texas and added Tech Services Do you think this is appropriate or can you offer any changes Original Message From Kanouff Erin Sent Wednesday July PM To Slone Jeanie Subject Redmond Responsibilities Hows this Responsible for negotiations deal structuring and customer coverage for the Texas Region as well as managing the ENA Technical Services

Lisa Hessepst Fred called yesterday to let me know he was going to move Lisa Hesse in to replace Judy Thorn on the Wellhead Desk Lisa is a Sr Spec currently making K She was not ranked at midyr but was ranked Strong at yrend She is on reduced hours which Fred believes works well for the position Just want to confirm that you are ok with this move to be effective Nov Thanks

RE Cc Paul received the standard business reorg package as a consequence of the storage group under Jean Mrha being dissolved Based on his service and salary Paul will receive assuming he signs a waiver and release Additionally Scott Hendrickson after days of looking for a position requested by Lavo will receive assuming he signs a separation agreement He was terminated for performance Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Friday October PM To Jones Robert W HR Exec Cc Slone Jeanie Fitzpatrick Amy Subject If anyone ever gets from us a leaving package I or John want to know about it Thanks Louise Case in point Paul Bienawski

lavos reviews Cc Please see below the update on lavos reviews Let me know if you need more info Complete Phillip Allen John Arnold Orlando Gonzalez Scott Josey Fred Lagrasta Laura Luce Tom Martin Rob Milnthorp Scott Neal Jim Schweiger Hunter Shively John Tompson Barry Tycholiz Frank Vickers John Zufferli Still to be written Michael Millerlavo will do Joe Deffnerlavo doesnt want to do this one He wants me to have Ben Glison to do I will check whis hr rep to see if that is possible think we might get some resistance Let me know if you have any ideas Ill keep you posted

RE two additional headcountpst Not sure if we had room in the open positions or if we were able to add headcount at this point I believe we added an admin spot in legal I will verify with David Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday February PM To Slone Jeanie Subject RE two additional headcount Where do we get the headcount room from Original Message From Slone Jeanie Sent Tuesday February PM To Kitchen Louise Subject two additional headcount Louise The following employees currently working on the floor but have not received offers from UBS and are still on the estate payroll Amy Shewster spreceptionist She is needed not only to direct and answer calls but for security purposes Jessie Villarealclerkrunner Jessie is the only clerk on the floor and is apparently filling a very vital role T Jae Black power Ina Rangel gas and Liz all agree that we need him long term We have two options Leave them on estate payroll and ask for them to be seconded to UBS for a period of time Give them UBS offersI would need to do this tomorrow morning in order to get in before deal close Let me know what you would like to do Thanks much

two additional headcountpst Louise The following employees currently working on the floor but have not received offers from UBS and are still on the estate payroll Amy Shewster spreceptionist She is needed not only to direct and answer calls but for security purposes Jessie Villarealclerkrunner Jessie is the only clerk on the floor and is apparently filling a very vital role T Jae Black power Ina Rangel gas and Liz all agree that we need him long term We have two options Leave them on estate payroll and ask for them to be seconded to UBS for a period of time Give them UBS offersI would need to do this tomorrow morning in order to get in before deal close Let me know what you would like to do Thanks much

Two Replacement Contractsplease approvepst Louise David asked that review the attached requests in his absence Both are replacement contracts at equal or less value than what we offered in original contracts Thanks JenaiKari will send the info as soon as we receive it from the estate Please place priority on the contract for Schields as we would like to have a fax as soon as possible on Thursday Call me on Thurs am if you still do not have what you need Thanks Jeanie

confidential employee informationOxley asked that I send you a few bullets on Tom Martin Please see below and let me know if you need further info Feedback from two exit interviews from voluntary terminations in regard to Tom is as follows was treated as inferior by my manager was lied to and insulted by my supervisor Tom berates employees in front of others and blames underlings for his mistakes Additionally he second guessed every position I put on sold me out of positions which turned out good and used all our allocated VAR for his own benefit Tom has a reputation for not representing employees well in the end of year review process I found this to be the case as well Tom is difficult to communicate with Additionally we had an incident w an employee when Tom offered her an employment agreement She felt that she was being forced to sign the agreement When she declined the agreement and turned in resignation she said that Tom said he would make it difficult for her to leave She said that she felt threatened by Tom Her boy friend called Tom and threatened him As a result Legal asked Tom not to have further contact with the employee
trading rankingaaPresto wanted to include Stepenovich Sr Spec and Rikki Imai MngrCS on the list

Confidential Employee InfoApst Larry Jestermid yrsuperior and yr endstrongReports to D GilbertSmith Real time trader great job looking for career advancement possibilities Keller Mayeaux mid yrstrong and yr endsatisfactoryHe was disgruntled at yr end and as a result he asked to get out of agreement and leave Enron now he wd like to stay at Enron Jester is preferable to Mayeaux Other groups are recruiting Jester

Important PRC infoRead and Respond by Monday June Apst Please review and verify the attached spreadsheet Make any corrections to employee info in RED on the spreadsheet As we will not hold a preranking meeting please provide a prerank of see attached rating descriptors for each employee COMMERCIAL Commercial employees are identified by a C in the Peer Group column You should be prepared to represent these employees at the July Commercial PRC meeting COMMERCIAL SUPPORT Commercial Support employees are identified by a CS in the Peer Group column Nonexempt employees ClerksAdminstrative AssistantsCoordinators will not participate in a PRC meeting Your ranking on the spreadsheet see attached rating descriptors under Job Group Participation will be the final ranking for these employees Note If your employees used the PEP system to do a selfevaluation it is important that you review the accomplishments section of the selfeval prior to attending a PRC meeting This information will be available to display on the screen during the meeting If you have any questions call me at Please send the completed spreadsheet to me no later than MONDAY JUNE

RE Jim Schwiegers Reviewthanks much Original Message From Martin Thomas A Sent Friday September AM To Slone Jeanie Subject Jim Schwiegers Review Jeanie Can you send me Jims evaluation form so I can write his midyear review John was out today so I did not get to ask about feedback on Jim Tom

RE ESOP KeepwholePST I left a voice mail for Robert and I certainly do not mind handling Im sorry we havent gotten resolution as of yet If you would like to call or send an email to Robert he is Robert W Jones in the system I will let you know what I hear back from Robert as well Original Message From Martin Thomas A Sent Tuesday January PM To Slone Jeanie Subject ESOP Keepwhole Jeanie I know I am probably becoming a pain in the butt about this ESOP clerical error issue but I would like to get this wrapped up before we go to UBS I do not believe that I will get any attention after I am no longer an Enron employee Should I contact Robert Jones directly Tom

transfer letterPST Yet again I anticipated having a letter to email out tonight Im almost there and just have to consult wone other person to ensure we have everything in it we need for a smooth transition I believe I will accomplish that early tomorrow morning and will email it to you both and followup w a hard copy to you John

RE HR PositionWe have an AnalystAssociate program for HR If she has an MBA or graduate degree we would consider her for the assoc program Otherwise she might fit in the analyst program Forward her resume to me and I will pass it along She can contact Karen Buckley at after you give me the resume Karen is the lead recruiterprogram manager Let me know if you need more info Original Message From Smith Matt Sent Thursday April To Slone Jeanie Subject HR Position Jeanie I have a friend who is interested in an HR position with Enron She spoke of a rotational program for HR that I am not familiar with Do you know anything about the program or who I might forward her resume to for an HR related position in general She has a few years of experience with a smaller firm and I think shes looking for a company with a more established HR department like Enron Also do you have knowledge of specific positions we are trying to fill in ENA Any info would be helpful Thanks Mat

REthanks much Original Message From Mayes Fran Sent Tuesday October AM To Cash Michelle Cc Slone Jeanie Subject RE One year is the non solicitation period June through May Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Monday October PM To Mayes Fran Cc Slone Jeanie Subject FW Fran do you know this off the top of your head Michelle Original Message From Slone Jeanie Sent Monday October PM To Cash Michelle Cc Sweet Twanda Subject Hey guys Do we have written in any document from the sale of HPL what the time limit is on recruiting from AEP The recruiters need further clarification on when we are all clear

FWHelp please Original Message From Homco Jim Sent Monday October PM To Slone Jeanie Subject Per our conversations I have two options from which to choose Accept another position within Enron by the end of October or receive an involuntary severance package In order to fully understand these options and in order to make an informed decision I feel it is necessary for me to be able to review the severance contract I will be required to sign Being asked to make this decision without access to the severance contract provisions denies me the capability to make an informed decision
Out of Office AutoReply I am concerned about Networks and NETCOI am out of the office until January If you need immediate attention please email Sarah Zarkowsky or Anne Labbe
Cc Hey guys Do we have written in any document from the sale of HPL what the time limit is on recruiting from AEP The recruiters need further clarification on when we are all clear

FW Cc How should I respond I have attached his previous email again Original Message From Homco Jim Sent Monday October PM To Slone Jeanie Subject Per our conversations I have two options from which to choose Accept another position within Enron by the end of October or receive an involuntary severance package In order to fully understand these options and in order to make an informed decision I feel it is necessary for me to be able to review the severance contract I will be required to sign Being asked to make this decision without access to the severance contract provisions denies me the capability to make an informed decision Original Message From Homco Jim Sent Monday October AM To Slone Jeanie Subject Have you heard anything from legal regarding my request of last Monday What will be the status of my benefits if I elect the severance

RE Tax Advise Barry Tycholizplease schedule and ask them to direct bill Enron If that isnt an option let me know and well figure out a way to pay for it Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Friday July PM To Slone Jeanie Subject FW Tax Advise Barry Tycholiz here is the tax info I just received and this departure counsel is what I am after BT Original Message From mailto Sent Friday July PM To Tycholiz Barry Subject RE Tax Advise Barry Tycholiz Barry We normally charge Enron for departure counselling and it involves an interview of about hours in which we discuss residency US tax considerations etc Please let me know when you would like to schedule the meeting Best regards Judy Wood Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary IAS Department Fax Tycholiz Barry To Judith L mericasCA BarryTycholiz cc ENRONcom Subject RE Tax Advise Barry Tycholiz AM Thanks for the reply It would be my expectation that Enron will pay but I will look into this and get back to you What do you think the cost will be BT Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday July AM To Cc Tycholiz Barry Subject Re Tax Advise Barry Tycholiz Good morning Barry Id be happy to provide you with assistance in this regard Will Enron be paying for this service Please let me know when it would be convenient for you to meet I am assuming this will be over the phone Best regards Judy Wood Perdomo PricewaterhouseCoopers Calgary IAS Department Fax Barry Kim Tycholiz To Judith L mericasCA oust cc onrrcom Subject Tax Advise Barry Tycholiz PM Judy you were assigned to my US and Canadian tax returns I am a employee of Enron North America and previously was an employee of Enron Canada in Calgary As we had discussed at the time of my filing I was never given any advise on my relocation to the US regarding tax issues As such I am not sure what some of my next moves should be I very much require some assistance regarding spousal employment My wife is a registered nurse and would like to work in the US but I have been advised that this may affect my filing in the US and perhaps could cost me more in US Taxes Can we set up a meeting to discuss strategies on making sure I am going about this properly This is my home email address you can contact me here or at my work address Thanks in advance BT The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer

FW Permanent Residency Barry TycholizOriginal Message From Daffin Margaret Sent Wednesday May To Tycholiz Barry Cc Slone Jeanie Subject Permanent Residency Barry Tycholiz Barry Jeanie Slone has asked me to send to you the Permanent Residency forms so that we can proceed with getting you a Green Card through Enron Please complete both forms and obtain all appropriate signatures and return to me at ACa along with a detailed current resume Upon receipt we will forward all information to the attorneys and get started Margaret Daffin HR Specialist Global Employee Services Fax

FW Barry L Tycholizyour donefinally thanks for your patience Original Message From Warren Davette Sent Tuesday November PM To Brasseaux Ben Cc Slone Jeanie Subject RE Barry L Tycholiz This was completed just in case I did not send you an email Thanks Original Message From Brasseaux Ben Sent Wednesday November PM To Warren Davette Cc Slone Jeanie Subject Barry L Tycholiz Davette We need to credit Barry Tycholiz P with hrs extra vacation time His offer letter said that he would receive an additional hrs vacation He has not yet been credited with the extra hrs He should be receiving a total of hrs vacation Please let me know when this has been completed Thanks Ben

RE flightyep intercontinental baby sounds like a plan Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Tuesday November PM To Slone Jeanie Subject flight if you are on continental are you flying into IAH Maybe that is what I should do and we could take one cab what do you think

more infoEmployee Assistance Program EAP The Company provides a confidential and voluntary assessment and referral service for family financial legal or other counseling The program is available to employees and their families experiencing personal problems in the areas of marital and family relations substance abuse stress management finances or legal concerns The EAP is available hours a day seven days a week by calling CNR Health at In Houston there is an onsite EAP professional in the Enron Building For an appointment with the onsite EAP professional call Support and Encouragement Services The Company provides a counselor for support and encouragement regarding grief loss and separation The service is provided to all employees by Dr Kelly Williams a minister with experience on the subject of grief and coping with loss There is no charge for up to three sessions and the services may be accessed separately from the Employee Assistance Program For an appointment call

RE confidential ee infoMark Can you email me or fax me any written documentation we have give to Heidi in regard to performance I have her reviews but thought we did some other written documentation Let me know Thanks Original Message From Whitt Mark Sent Tuesday November PM To Slone Jeanie Subject Termination of Heidi Dubose Have you heard anything from the HR lawyers regarding our ability to fire her in the near future for poor performance
